overview: The story begins as Bart (Bart Williams), owner of a private bath house, is "arranging" a special hot scene for one of his many clients involving a swarthy, muscular marine- a sex-hungry serviceman who knows how to satisfy his throbbing, pent up sexual needs! Bart is a supplier of male fantasies who provides his horny clientele with the ultimate in sexual satisfaction within the erotic confines of his wild bath house! This hard action video features eight hot, young studs who are eager to live out their man to man, X-rated trips! Bart willingly assists them all to achieve this- and in the end, he too experiences his own ultimate sexual desire with a mind-blowing orgy.
title: Bathhouse Fantasies
